nodes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
nodes.name: add

nodes.documentation: @dev Accepts ether and creates new BAT tokens.
nodes.name: createTokens

nodes.documentation: @dev Ends the funding period and sends the ETH home
nodes.name: finalize

nodes.documentation: @dev Allows contributors to recover their ether in the case of a failed funding campaign.
nodes.name: refund
